sourcesContent:
import React , { useState }from 'react'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from "yup"; export default function Contact() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }, validationSchema , onSubmit: handleSubmit }); const handleSubmit = async (values) => { console.log(values); } const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string() .min(2, 'Too Short!') .max(40, 'Too Long!') .required('Required'), email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email') .required('Required'), subject: Yup.string() .min(6, 'Too Short!') .max(80, 'Too Long!') .required('Required'), message: Yup.string() .min(20, 'Too Short!') .max(400, 'Too Long!') .required('Required'), }); return (

Contact

Contact Us

Email:

hello@coolage.app

Call:

+91 72219 04716 , +91 79749 22411

{formik.errors.name && formik.touched.name ? formik.errors.name : null}
{formik.errors.email && formik.touched.email ? formik.errors.email : null}
{formik.errors.subject && formik.touched.subject ? formik.errors.subject : null}
{formik.errors.message && formik.touched.message ? formik.errors.message : null}

Your message has been sent. Thank you!
) }
